import toml
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

read[source]

read(wcsfile:str)

Read WCS (key,value) pairs from DS9's *.wcs files

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def read(wcsfile: str) -> dict: 
    "Read WCS (key,value) pairs from DS9's *.wcs files"
    with open(wcsfile) as stream:
        return toml.loads(_fixups(stream.read()))
{% endraw %}

Internal functions

These are not part of the API.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Example of usage

{% raw %} 
wcs = read("testdata/mosaic-1996-HH204-align-robberto.wcs")
wcs

{'DATE-OBS': '21/03/95',
 'EQUINOX': 2000,
 'CTYPE1': 'RA---TAN',
 'CRPIX1': 388.39887,
 'CRVAL1': 83.8433551,
 'CDELT1': 0.0,
 'CTYPE2': 'DEC--TAN',
 'CRPIX2': 567.14165,
 'CRVAL2': -5.4192964,
 'CDELT2': 0.0,
 'CD1_1': -2.76664e-05,
 'CD1_2': 3.804223e-08,
 'CD2_1': 4.913188e-09,
 'CD2_2': 2.764793e-05}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert wcs["CDELT2"] == 0.0
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(wcs["EQUINOX"], 2000)
{% endraw %}
